text:
I have configured 3 different LogFilePatternReceivers in my Chainsaw startup
configuration file (see attachments). The 3 files represented by these receivers
are properly loaded into Chainsaw log panels. However, the Receivers panel only
shows the last receiver in the configuration (see screenshot).
creator: timothy.high@sknt.com
timothy.high@sknt.com
text:
Created attachment 19778
Log files, Chainsaw configuration and screenshot

This is because all of the Receiver plugins specified in the configuration have
the same name.  Give each plugin a different name and it should work.
creator: psmith@apache.org
psmith@apache.org
text:
I don't think we'll fix this one.  If you specify receivers with the same name,
it's just not going to get you too far.

(In reply to comment #3)
> I don't think we'll fix this one.  If you specify receivers with the same name,
> it's just not going to get you too far.

Ok, I see my mistake. I assumed the name was determined by the <name> tag, but I
hadn't noticed the "name" attribute of the plugin tag.
creator: timothy.high@sknt.com
